cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.current_location: about 70 mi SSE of Key West, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: tracking north-northwest through the Straits of Florida toward the Lower Florida Keys and then along the west coast of Florida

weather_observation.watch_coast: North of Fernandina Beach FL to Edisto Beach SC (Hurricane Watch); West of Indian Pass to Okaloosa/Walton County Line FL and North of Fernandina Beach to South Santee River SC (Tropical Storm Warning)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from Fernandina Beach FL southward around the Florida peninsula to Indian Pass FL, including the Florida Keys, Lake Okeechobee, Florida Bay and portions of north-central Cuba; Storm Surge Warning from South Santee River SC southward around the Florida peninsula to Ochlockonee River FL including the Keys and Tampa Bay
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Straits of Florida, Florida Keys, entire Florida peninsula, north-eastern Gulf Coast, and portions of southeast Georgia and South Carolina
